name: Solarpunk Wickedness Alternate Setting
description:
I fight for myself, for my friends, and for a brighter future.(Blacken with vengeance, power, chaos, or any other self-sabotaging purpose.)

This is a new alternate setting for Wickedness by Possum Creek Games Inc. It is about the struggle to keep the world lively while wanting nothing more than a sustainable society.

Solarpunk:

Solarpunk's themes find its roots in environmental activism, urging people to think critically about the impact they have on nature. Solarpunk is not just a realm of fantasy, but an idealistic outline of what our world could look like if we decided to make it so.

If you do not believe in the disastrous impact that climate change is having on our planet, please educate yourself and look at the countless examples of the world crumbling as a result of human actions. Climate change is a problem for everyone and if we want this world to have a future, we need to act now. 

If you are able, please consider donating to climate change organizations dedicated to correcting the course our planet is on and preventing any more permanent damage to our ecosystem. I recommend visiting Giving Green, which has information on charitable organizations and provides details about which areas use your dollar most efficiently. 

If you provide me with proof of donation of $5 or more to any climate change organizations, I will send you a copy of my Solarpunk Wickedness Alternate Setting and add an additional community copy on this page. Each $5 after that adds an additional community copy ($5 = 1 copy, $10 = 2 copies, $15 = 3 copies, etc). Message me on twitter @pcburke2017 or email me at pcburke2017@gmail.com with screenshots.

Required For Play:
  • Wickedness (The game for which this is a supplement of)
  • 3 players
  • A deck of tarot cards
Actual Play: Stay tuned for a three-part series featuring Samantha Overton, Danie Merrill, and myself, Patrick Conner Burke, in our actual play debut premiering August, 2021! Credits:

CW for this Alt Setting: Mention of and illustrations of bugs and insects.
